statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model_name="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; dir="$(basename \"$(pwd)\")"; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch="$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)"; if git diff --quiet --exit-code 2>/dev/null && git diff --cached --quiet --exit-code 2>/dev/null; then dirty=""; else dirty="*"; fi; git_info=".${branch}${dirty}"; else git_info=""; fi; printf '\033[33m%s@%s%s =>\033[0m  ' "$model_name" "$dir" "$git_info"
